headline: Bank of America resets jobs forecast before unemployment report
summary: All eyes are on unemployment this year after job losses surged in 2025, causing the unemployment rate to climb to 4.6% in November, up from 4% in January, and a low of 3.4% in 2023. The uptick in unemployment prompted the Federal Reserve to overlook inflation concerns, leading to interest rate cuts ...
